channel.title: CVE Feed for https://github.com/sferik -- rails_admin ruby gem
channel.description: The latest CVEs for https://github.com/sferik -- rails_admin ruby gem

item.title: CVE-2016-10522|2024-08-06T03:21:52.174Z -- https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fsferik -- rails_admin%20ruby%20gem
item.description: rails_admin ruby gem <v1.1.1 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks. Non-GET methods were not validating CSRF tokens and, as a result, an attacker could hypothetically gain access to the application administrative endpoints exposed by the gem.
